name: Diabetic Caramel Popcorn
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: Spread popcorn evenly in large, shallow baking pan. In small saucepan, melt margarine and blend in honey. Pour over popcorn, stirring to coat all pieces. Bake at 325Â° for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring often. Cool slightly in pan before removing. Store in airtight contain- er. Serving size: 1 cup. Per serving: calories: 108, carbohydrate: 16g, protein: 2g, fat: 4 g, sodium: 42 mg. Exchanges per serving: 1 starch, 1 fat.
